name: borrower
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person or organization that borrows something, especially money from a bank: Banks are encouraging new borrowers. The borrower is charged interest from the time the loan is disbursed until it is paid back in full. Borrowers of library books should return them when they are due.
More examplesFewer examplesFor most borrowers, size of the monthly payment is the most important factor in their loan choice.Borrowers pay more fees and interest each time they refinance.The writer is a keen-eyed borrower of folk tales and themes.
